text: Gabriella Natalie Charlton is a former child artist seen in Tamil movie and TV shows. She made her first appearance on a TV show in a dance program. She also won the title Jodi Number One Season 6. == Career == === Television career === Gabriella started her career in television at the age of nine by appearing in Jodi Junior, a dance reality show aired in STAR Vijay. Winning the title gave her opportunities in the film industry. She also appeared as Gaby in 7aam Vaguppu C Pirivu, a Tamil school opera aired in STAR Vijay. She also appeared in Jodi Number One, Season 6, a dance reality show aired in STAR Vijay. She won the sixth season of Jodi Number One. 4rfgycxxxxxxxerhy6uk5cxez4gtbvciuvbhgcu7ilknnvyio;8,'[pn0b === Film career === Gabriella made her acting debut with the romantic – psychological thriller 3, playing the role of Shruti Haasan's sister Sumi. She later played an interesting role as Ria in Chennaiyil Oru Naal. She also appeared in Samuthirakani's recent movie Appa, in the role of Rashitha Bhanu. ==Filmography== *All films are in Tamil, unless otherwise noted. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" !
